ticket.title: starting a translation with an interpolation without quotations provokes error
ticket.original-body:
In a YAML translation file the translation time_ago: {{duration}} ago provokes an error: "syntax error" raised during the YAML file parsing
whereas time_ago: ago {{duration}} time_ago: '{{duration}} ago' time_ago: "{{duration}} ago" do not
Tested with Rails 2.3.4
This is an edge case, maybe just mentioning it in the doc is enough if it is hard to fix.
